imdb.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
imdb.plot: Thanks to the Leo Corporation, headed by Reiji Akaba, new advancements to Solid Vision, the holographic system that gives life to the Duel Monsters card game, give physical mass to monsters and environments, allowing players to in...

episodes.title: Menu Venue: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yuya is served a heaping helping of culinary catastrophe when he duels a celebrity chef with a menu full of merciless food monsters!

episodes.title: Menu Venue: Part 2
episodes.plot: The table is set for a frenzied food fight to the finish! Can Yuya handle what Chef Pepper dishes out, or will he lose a lot more than his appetite?

episodes.title: Scream for the Green
episodes.plot: Dennis and Gong are in for the ride of their lives when they're introduced to the turbo-charged world of underground motorcycle dueling!

episodes.title: Dueling's Most Wanted
episodes.plot: The battle between Dashin' Dennis and Sweet Baby Shay hits a speedbump when Sector Security pulls the plug on their Turbo Duel!

episodes.title: Showdown in the Slammer
episodes.plot: Yuya learns the ins and outs of The Facility the hard way by coming face-to-face with the toughest and most dangerous duelist in the cell block: the Kingpin!

episodes.title: Hero's Fall
episodes.plot: With his deck on the line, Yuya looks to rock the cell block and KO the Kingpin!

episodes.title: The Great Escape
episodes.plot: Yuya is determined to do the impossible and escape from The Facility, but when friends become foes, his plan to break out breaks down!

episodes.title: Fight for Freedom
episodes.plot: When Yuya and his pals try to flee The Facility, their big breakout takes a terrible turn when their escape route leads them straight into the security guards!

episodes.title: Match with the Master
episodes.plot: The opening ceremonies of the Friendship Cup kick into overdrive as Yuya squares off against the Master of Faster - Jack Atlas!

episodes.title: Traits of a Traitor
episodes.plot: With the Friendship Cup about to kick off, Yuya learns about tournament champion Jack's rise to the Tops!

episodes.title: Crow's Crew
episodes.plot: The first duel of the Friendship Cup has the green light as Crow and Gong put the pedal to the metal!

episodes.title: Riley's Reveal
episodes.plot: Riley's been chosen to Turbo Duel Shinji, but the battle hits a speedbump when Yuya steps in to stop the duel and keep his pint-sized pal in one piece!

episodes.title: A Concerted Effort
episodes.plot: Yuya's friends are forced to face off in a duel where the loser is banished forever! No matter who wins, Yuya loses!

episodes.title: Common Cause
episodes.plot: For Shinji to inspire the Commons to stand up to the Topsiders, he must first take down Moon Shadow! Can Shinji's monsters swarm together and deliver the sting of defeat, or will Moon Shadow's ninjas silence all the buzz?

episodes.title: The Gift of Grit
episodes.plot: As the Friendship Cup picks up the pace, Jack Atlas takes a timeout to reveal the secrets of his past!

episodes.title: Duel Consequences
episodes.plot: Officer 227 is in hot pursuit to take Yuya down - all the way down to the underground! Can Yuya outrun the long arm of the law, or does 227 have his number?

episodes.title: Turbotainers
episodes.plot: Sylvio finally takes center stage at the Friendship Cup, but will he crash and burn under the spotlight?

episodes.title: Turning Point
episodes.plot: An escapee from the underground brings word to Yuya on how to take control of the Friendship Cup!

episodes.title: A Traitor Unmasked
episodes.plot: Shay's duel with Dennis turns into a battle of wits when he tries to force Dennis to reveal his dark secret!

episodes.title: Shay's Revenge
episodes.plot: After finding out that Dennis is from the Fusion Dimension, Shay sets his sights on getting revenge!

episodes.title: Plans of Attack
episodes.plot: Yuya and Roget reflect on their pasts to make plans for the future!

episodes.title: A Cons Game
episodes.plot: Zuzu goes deck-to-deck against Sergey - an ex-con who's looking to "X" out the competition!

episodes.title: Rebel Road
episodes.plot: Zuzu's been hurt, but Yuya can't race to her rescue until he defeats Shinji first!

episodes.title: Road to Rebellion
episodes.plot: Shinji's Battlewasps are stinging Yuya to submission! But does Yuya have one last card that will tip the scales in his favor?

episodes.title: Where the Truth Lies
episodes.plot: Yuya's newest ally is ... Roget? Questions are raised that plunge Yuya's reputation into a freefall!

episodes.title: Battle Birds
episodes.plot: Crow and Shay soar down the track in a high-flying battle where the loser will crash land into the underground!

episodes.title: Warriors of the Air
episodes.plot: Shay and Crow's winged warriors fight, claw and flap towards the finale ... until an unexpected guest decides to join their duel!

episodes.title: A Matter of Trust
episodes.plot: Zuzu's on the run from Sector Security, but can a little help from some little friends help her avoid big trouble?

episodes.title: A Plan and a Promise: Part 1
episodes.plot: The Friendship Cup heats up as Yugo and Celina tear through the tricky twists and turns of a transforming duel track!

episodes.title: A Plan and a Promise: Part 2
episodes.plot: Yugo's in for a bumpy ride as he's forced to zigzag his way across a duel track that's been mapped for mayhem by Roget!

episodes.title: Against All Odds
episodes.plot: Furious over Celina's failure at the Friendship Cup, Roget sends a squad of Sector Security to seize her.

episodes.title: The Many Dimensions of Yuya
episodes.plot: Yuya's battle with Crow takes a turn for the worse when Roget takes control of Yuya's mind!

episodes.title: Wake Up Call
episodes.plot: Crow gets a crash course on double crossing when Yuya pulls a U-turn on their friendship!

episodes.title: Hunted and Hounded
episodes.plot: Obelisk Force has invaded New Domino City to capture Zuzu and Celina! Can Yuya and his friends stop this unstoppable force?

episodes.title: Down with the Underground
episodes.plot: Barrett has returned to snatch Celina back to Duel Academy - unless the Lancers can stop him!

episodes.title: Chain Game
episodes.plot: Barrett has chained up Yuya and his monsters! Can Yuya break his shackles before Barrett breaks away with Celina?

episodes.title: Tragic Reunion
episodes.plot: Yuya's battle with Barrett comes to a shocking conclusion when a mind-controlled madman drops into their duel!

episodes.title: Road Rage: Part 1
episodes.plot: It's Jack's most dangerous duel ever as he takes on Roget's maniacal minion - Sergey!

episodes.title: Road Rage: Part 2
episodes.plot: Can Jack Atlas best Sergey, when Sergey combines the best of man and machine?

episodes.title: Martial Law
episodes.plot: Roget declares himself leader of New Domino City! Can the Lancers overthrow this madman, or will Roget's Sector Security end any chances they have?

episodes.title: The Imitation
episodes.plot: The Friendship Cup finale is finally here! Jack and Yuya square off to see who will become New Domino City's newest champion!

episodes.title: Making It Mine
episodes.plot: Jack pushes Yuya to his limits in the Friendship Cup finale! Does Yuya have the dueltaining skills to dethrone the Master of Faster, or will Jack's rule reign supreme?

episodes.title: Friendship Finale
episodes.plot: With the City on the edge of their seats, a new champion is about to be crowned! But who will sit in the winner's circle: Yuya or Jack?

episodes.title: A Vicious Cycle
episodes.plot: The Friendship Cup may be over, but trouble sure isn't! Roget is planning to take Zuzu to Duel Academy!

episodes.title: A Warlike Welcome
episodes.plot: Yuya's been transported to a strange new world that's been decimated by Duel Academy!

episodes.title: Realm of the Cipher Dragon
episodes.plot: Yuya and his pals cross paths with a mysterious duelist who's got his eyes set on destroying every enemy in the galaxy!

episodes.title: Rush for Revenge
episodes.plot: Yuya's got his duel training cut out for him as he tries to convince Kite he's not the enemy!

episodes.title: Rise of the Resistance
episodes.plot: While Yuya learns troubling news about his dad in one dimension, Zuzu is on the run against Duel Academy in another!

episodes.title: Rumble in the Rubble
episodes.plot: Yuya stumbles across one of Duel Academy's most dangerous duelists... and his dad's #1 enemy!

episodes.title: An Academic Test
episodes.plot: The secret behind Yuya's dad's disappearance is finally revealed!

episodes.title: Fighting for Friendship
episodes.plot: Old friends become new enemies when Shay and Kite collide!

episodes.title: Belles and Whistles
episodes.plot: Duel Academy's twins of terror arrive to destroy the Lancers!

episodes.title: Twins with Tudes
episodes.plot: Yuya and Shay face a double dose of danger when they take on the Professor's go-to goonettes - the Tyler twins!

episodes.title: Surprise Showing
episodes.plot: Yuya and his pals are ambushed by Obelisk Force and their dogs of doom!

episodes.title: Fenced In
episodes.plot: Yuya has a date with destiny when he comes face-to-face with Aster Phoenix!

episodes.title: Last Laugh
episodes.plot: Is Yuya destined for defeat or can he twist and turn his way free from Aster's onslaught?

episodes.title: Hat-Trick
episodes.plot: Aster Phoenix and the Tyler twins switch sides and join Team Yuya! But will this be enough to defeat The Professor's mighty army?

episodes.title: The Joy of Revenge
episodes.plot: A duelist from the past has crossed dimensions to settle an old score with Yuya!

episodes.title: All Duel Hands on Deck
episodes.plot: It's a high-stakes duel on the high seas when Dennis and Kite clash on a cruise ship!

episodes.title: Shiver Me Lancers
episodes.plot: Yuya and the gang have been shanghaied by a corrupt captain working for The Professor!

episodes.title: A Towering Achievement
episodes.plot: Kite and Yugo storm Duel Academy to free Rin and Lulu, but when they run into two guardians, their rescues go awry!

episodes.title: Show of Nature
episodes.plot: BB's wild side takes its toll on Yuya leaving BB on the verge of victory!

episodes.title: Grip of the Parasite
episodes.plot: Yugo's hopes of a warm reunion with Rin are put on ice when she's not the same girl he remembers.

episodes.title: Survival of the Fittest
episodes.plot: Yuya and the gang are forced to battle against Duel Academy's most dangerous duelists in a Survival Duel!

episodes.title: Family Face Off
episodes.plot: It's a battle between brother and sister when Lulu launches a surprise attack on Shay! Can these siblings work things out, or will this family feud tear them apart forever?

episodes.title: Fusion Destruction
episodes.plot: It's a battle between good and evil when Alexis goes head-to-head with Duel Academy's most dangerous duelist - Yuri!

episodes.title: Rise of the Parasites
episodes.plot: Celina and Lulu corner Yuya and force him to duel in a bugged-out battle royal.

episodes.title: An Evil Ascends
episodes.plot: The Professor details the horrors of the most dangerous and destructive duelist to ever exist, Z-ARC!

episodes.title: What Lurks Beneath
episodes.plot: The Professor is determined to defeat Yuya - but will beating Yuya actually be good for the fate of mankind?

episodes.title: A Duel Within
episodes.plot: Leo wants to join the four dimensions into one, so Declan and Yuya join forces to stop him!

episodes.title: Sibling Standoff
episodes.plot: Declan and Riley stop seeing eye-to-eye and start going toe-to-toe!

episodes.title: Sleight of Hand
episodes.plot: It's curtains for Yusho unless he can put on the show of the century and stop Yuri!

episodes.title: A Father's Finale
episodes.plot: Yuri has one final trick up his sleeve to make Yusho disappear for good!

episodes.title: Relentless
episodes.plot: Yuya begins to unravel as he wrestles with Z-ARC's power!

episodes.title: Time to Reunite!
episodes.plot: As Z-ARC's grip over Yuya tightens, Yuya struggles to find a way to defeat Yuri!

episodes.title: A Most Brutal Duel
episodes.plot: Z-ARC has resurrected! Can anyone stop his relentless onslaught?

episodes.title: A Dark Summoning
episodes.plot: Kite and Shay team up to take Z-ARC down, but will Z-ARC's fury be too much for these two to fend off?

episodes.title: Master of Disaster
episodes.plot: Jack and Gong must kick things into overdrive if they want to steer Z-ARC to a dead end!

episodes.title: Clash Talk
episodes.plot: With Z-ARC defeating all their friends, it's up to Sylvio and Crow to form the last line of defense!

episodes.title: A Ray of Hope
episodes.plot: Can Declan and Leo work out their long-simmering differences to defeat Z-ARC?

episodes.title: Deja Duel
episodes.plot: As Yuya's memories slowly come back to him, his life points zip toward zero as he tries to dueltain his way around a two-on-one battle!

episodes.title: The Metropolis of Despair - Heartland
episodes.plot: Yuya reaches a new place - Heartland City, the hometown of Yuto and Shay in the Xyz Dimension along with Sylvio and Gong. There they meet Duel Academy soldiers and an independent warrior from that dimension.

episodes.title: Galactic Eyes
episodes.plot: Gongenzaka and Sawatari fight against the mysterious Kaito, who believes them to be agents of Academia. As he summons his fearsome Galaxy Eyes Cipher Dragon, Yuto notes that something has changed in Kaito.

episodes.title: The Merciless Hunter
episodes.plot: Kaito begins a merciless assault against Yuya with his powerful Galaxy Eyes deck. With Yuto's spirit on his side, Yuya tries to match Kaito's indomitable spirit with both Odd Eyes Pendulum Dragon and Dark Rebellion Xyz Dragon.

episodes.title: The Brilliant Machine Angels
episodes.plot: Yuya and the others meet the Xyz Resistance, who discuss how Heartland fell to ruin and Yusho's mysterious connection to them. Elsewhere, in the Fusion Dimension, Yuzu flees Academia soldiers when someone unexpected comes to her rescue.

episodes.title: The HERO Bearing the Name of "D"
episodes.plot: Yusho explains what happened during his disappearance to Yuzu while in the Fusion Dimension. Back in Heartland, Yuya comes across an angry youth with a grudge against his Dueltaining style as Yuto refuses to stand by any longer.

episodes.title: The Bonds of the Resistance
episodes.plot: Shun is determined to convince Kaito to rejoin the Resistance despite Kaito's adamant refusal. As the former friends cannot convince each other either way, they decide all they can do is fight against each other.

episodes.title: Arc Area Project
episodes.plot: Yusho reveals that three years ago he learned of the Arc Area Project and Academia's machinations, going on a journey to stop Leo's plans. Yuri arrives at the You Show Duel School to stamp out the resistance against Academia.

episodes.title: The Duel-Starved Amazoness
episodes.plot: Allen and Sayaka try to fight Kaito only to end up facing Grace and Gloria Tyler, two of Academia's strongest enforcers. Having no choice but to fight, they face off against the Tyler's Amazoness deck.

episodes.title: Amazoness Trap
episodes.plot: As Sawatari and Gongenzaka both fail to defeat the Tyler sisters, Yuya and Shun arrive to meet their challenge. In the face of their near perfect combo, Yuya must not give into his rage and defeat his powerful foes.

episodes.title: The Falcon Perishes on the Battlefield
episodes.plot: Yuya and the others try to return to the Resistance base when they are attacked by the Obelisk Force. They try to face the power of the Obelisk Force when Shun becomes gravely injured during the battles.

episodes.title: The Torn Smile World
episodes.plot: Academia's enforcer Edo Phoenix challenges Yuya to a rematch. Torn between his allegiance to the Professor and his spirit of Dueltaining, a confused Edo is determined to crush Yuya and the ghost of Yusho that haunts him.

episodes.title: Pendulum Heart
episodes.plot: As their duel goes on, Edo only becomes more conflicted of where his allegiances lie. Seeing Edo suffer, Yuya is determined to remind him how fun dueling can be and begins his greatest Dueltaining performance yet.

episodes.title: Toward a City Filled with Smiles
episodes.plot: Convincing Edo, the Tyler twins, and the rest of the forces in Heartland to join their side, Yuya and the other Lancers prepare to head to the Fusion Dimension to find their friends and restore everyone who has been turned into a card.

episodes.title: The Thirst for Carnage
episodes.plot: Yuya encounters his old foe from the Junior Youth Championship, Kachidoki. Kachidoki continues to use violent tactics and powerful Fusions in his Action Duels as Yuya tries to return a smile to his heart.

episodes.title: The Supergalaxy Shining in the Darkness
episodes.plot: Yuya and co board a ship to Duel Academy when Dennis catches up to them, aiming to defeat Yusho once and for all. A still vengeful Kaito meets Dennis's challenge as the two unleash their greatest monsters.

episodes.title: Duel Pirate Captain Solo
episodes.plot: Serena, who appeared before the Lancers, suddenly betrays them and captures Yuzu while Yuya is forced to fight Captain Solo. Caught between useless cards and Solo's lock deck, things seem hopeless when more allies suddenly arrive.

episodes.title: Protectors of the Sun and Moon
episodes.plot: Yugo meets with up the others and agree to work together against Academia. Yugo and Kaito head to the towers where Rin and Ruri are being held captive, only to face the guardians Apollo and Diana.

episodes.title: The Sinister Bell's Chime
episodes.plot: The Doctor has brainwashed Ruri and Rin, leading them to fight against Yugo and Kaito. Meanwhile, Reiji recounts how all of Yuya's counterparts as well as all the bracelet girls are part of Leo's ultimate plan: Revival Zero.

episodes.title: Survival Duel
episodes.plot: Yuya and the Lancers finally make it the Academy, but they are captured and thrown into a wild battle royale against the Obelisk Force. However, a mysterious enemy in the royale begins wiping out friend and foe alike.

episodes.title: The Little Bird Trapped in Darkness
episodes.plot: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allie's deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

episodes.title: The Battle Beast
episodes.plot: The wild duelist known as Battle Beast crushes his fellow Academy students and even turns Crow and Tsukikage into cards. Yuya and Gongenzaka arrive to face the challenge of their insane foe.

episodes.title: The Wicked Brand
episodes.plot: Jack appears out of nowhere and joins Yuya in fighting against Battle Beast. Battle Beast's instructor, Sanders, joins in the duel as well to show the power and glory of the Academy to the Lancers.

episodes.title: Glory on the Academia!
episodes.plot: Battle Beast continues his rampage against friend and foe alike. Sensing nothing but rage and anger in Battle Beast's heart, Yuya is determined to show him how fun dueling can actually be and aims to purge his demons.

episodes.title: The Glorious Machine Dragon
episodes.plot: Asuka stays behind to fight Yuri while Sora and the others go on ahead. Yuri uses a different deck and fights Asuka, who tries to reach out a helping hand to Yuri. That's when Yuri reveals the real reason why he does what he does.

episodes.title: The Revived Phantom Knights
episodes.plot: Yuya comes across Ruri, who is still under the control of the Doctor's parasites. Yuya attempts to fight off Ruri, made harder when Serena joins the fight. Yuto decides to take control and face the two girls.

episodes.title: The Blazing Dragon
episodes.plot: Yuya and Yuto are struggling in their battle against Ruri and Serena and their Parasite Queen. The Doctor attempts to take control of Yuya using a parasite as well, but that only awakens the rage inside of Yuya once again.

episodes.title: The Day the Devil Was Born
episodes.plot: Leo Akaba reveals to Yusho Sakaki how the four dimensions came to be.

episodes.title: Revival Zero
episodes.plot: Leo continues his story about how Zarc destroyed the original world. Leo's daughter Ray used four cards to stop Zarc and split the world into the four current worlds. He then reveals the true nature of Yuya, Yuzu, and the Arc Area Project.

episodes.title: Decisive Battle! Spirit Tech Force
episodes.plot: Leo begins his final plan to fuse the dimensions and revive his daughter Ray. Reiji and Yuya team up to take down Leo, with Yuya resolving not to let Zarc be revived. Yusho realizes that even this is part of a larger enemy's plan.

episodes.title: Glimpse of the Supreme King
episodes.plot: Leo's plan gets further and further to completion, which causes the evil inside of Yuya to emerge once more. Yusho stops the duel and realizes that Zarc's influence is hovering over everything, including Yuya's other counterparts.

episodes.title: The Greedy Venomous Dragon
episodes.plot: Yugo and Yuri being their duel, with Zarc's shared influence forcing them into battle. To stop Zarc's revival, Kaito and Edo join the battle as well to hold back Yuri's powerful Fusion Dragon.

episodes.title: The Light Shining in Eternal Darkness
episodes.plot: While Yuri and Yugo continue their savage battle, Reira starts hearing the voice of Ray. Aiming to make sure Ray is revived, Reira stands against Reiji and the siblings begin a duel with each other.

episodes.title: The Peerless Entertainer
episodes.plot: Reiji manages to defeat Reira, continuing on to fight Leo. Elsewhere, Yuri absorbs Yugo and aims to defeat Yuya so that Zarc can be completed. Yusho stands in for his son to fight the depraved youth instead.

episodes.title: A Dazzling Entertainment Show
episodes.plot: Yusho's advanced Dueltaining manages to push Yuri into a corner and bring Yuya back to his old self. But Yuri is determined to complete Zarc's revival and has one nasty surprise in store for Yusho.

episodes.title: Allure of Darkness
episodes.plot: Seeing his father carded in front of his eyes, Yuya's rage reaches a boiling point as he accepts Yuri's challenge. But not only does he have to contend with Yugo and Yuri's dragons, but Zarc's ever growing influence over him.

episodes.title: The Trembling Dimensions
episodes.plot: The four dimensions start to fuse together as Yuya continues to struggle against Yuri. Forced to discard his trump card, things seem hopeless. Yuya's friends then arrive to encourage him to keep fighting no matter what.

episodes.title: Reign of the Supreme Dragon King
episodes.plot: Yuya absorbs all of his counterparts and reclaimed his true form as Supreme King Z-ARC. Starting to lay waste to the Fusion Dimension, Sora and Edo challenge Zarc to try and reach out to Yuya's spirit.

episodes.title: The Rebellious Supreme King's Dragon Servant
episodes.plot: The four dimensions continue to unite as Zarc effortlessly crushes Sora and Edo. Kaito and Shun continue the fight against Zarc while people from Heartland and Neo Domino City start appearing in the Fusion Dimension.

episodes.title: The Shadow-Winged Dragon
episodes.plot: Gongenzaka and Jack fight against Zarc next, trying their best to reach out to Yuya's soul buried in Zarc's darkness. A revived Crow and Sawatari decide to join in when Zarc's Supreme King Dragons swarm the field.

episodes.title: The Eyes Tainted by Darkness
episodes.plot: Crow notices that Zarc is starting to lose his composure, leading him and Sawatari to up their game against Zarc's dragons. As dimensional integration is getting closer to completion, Reiji tries to convince his dad to stop Zarc.

episodes.title: Pendulum of the Soul
episodes.plot: Ray's soul possesses Reira so she can battle against Zarc alongside Reiji. Zarc boasts that he is the creator of Pendulum Summon, but Ray is determined to stop him once and for all using the four natural energy cards.

episodes.title: Junior Youth Championship
episodes.plot: Things have seemingly returned to normal in the Pendulum Dimension, but Yuya gets the feeling that something is missing. Reiji has him duel against Tsukikage to restore his memories and make him finish the Lancer's goal for good.

episodes.title: Overflowing Memories
episodes.plot: The battle royale continues. As Yuya keeps fighting, his memories start flooding back to him. Yuzu's dad suddenly remembers too as the rest of the world slowly begins to remember the Lancers and the battle against Zarc.

episodes.title: Soul of the Supreme King
episodes.plot: Reiji reveals that Zarc is still alive and Reira is barely holding back his malevolence. The world must be united and Yuya must purge Zarc's evil once and for all. Yuya is unsure. but Gongenzaka attempts to ignite his fighting spirit.

episodes.title: The Cursed Gear Mask
episodes.plot: Yuya arrives in the Xyz Dimensions with Dennis as his next opponent. Threatening to turn the traumatized citizens of Heartland into cards again, Dennis forces Yuya into a duel against him and his Xyz/Fusion mix.

episodes.title: Endless Rebellion
episodes.plot: Yuya arrives in the Fusion Dimension where he finds a distraught Shun. Like with Yuya's counterparts, Ruri and the others have not been resurrected following Ray's revival. Yuya tries to calm Shun down only to end up the target of his fury.

episodes.title: Dimension Highway
episodes.plot: Jack appears to taunt Yuya over his fear of using his counterpart's dragons in fear of summoning Zarc. Unable to accomplish anything as is, Yuya challenges Jack to a duel while Reiji makes it so everyone can watch the battle.

episodes.title: The Unleashed Dragons
episodes.plot: Yuya finally listens to his other selves and summons all four of his dragons to defeat Jack. However, there is one final challenge before him in order to become a Dueltainer and purge Zarc: his rival and friend Reiji Akaba.

episodes.title: The Miracle Drawn by the Pendulum
episodes.plot: The curtain is about to fall for the last time. The final battle between Yuya and Reiji rages on. Dragons face off against D/D/D as the whole world watches. What will be the final fate of Yuya, Yuzu, and all four dueling dimensions?

episodes.title: Dueling Declan
episodes.plot: Furious by Declan's revealed plan about the "Lancers", Yuya challenges him to a duel.

episodes.title: Kings vs. Dragons
episodes.plot: Yuya's battle with Declan takes a turn for the worse when Declan's majestic monsters give Yuya the royal treatment!

episodes.title: Parental Guidance: Part 1
episodes.plot: It's a family feud when Yuya takes on his mom in a duel where there's more to lose than just his allowance! Can Yuya avoid being run down by Paradise City's most feared motorcycle momma?

episodes.title: Parental Guidance: Part 2
episodes.plot: The battle between Yuya and his mom kicks into high gear! Can Yuya avoid being grounded, or will Loco Yoko put the pedal to the metal and throttle her way to victory?

episodes.title: City 'Scape
episodes.plot: As Zuzu and Yugo try to unravel the riddle of Yuya's dimensional doubles, their sleuthing is cut short by Sector Security!

episodes.title: Tops Speed
episodes.plot: Zuzu and Yugo redline their Duel Runner in a high-stakes Turbo Duel with Sector Security! Can they outrun the long arm of the law, or will Security put the brakes on their escape?

episodes.title: Synchro Sector
episodes.plot: When Yuya and his pals arrive in the Synchro Dimension, Sector Security is waiting for them with open arms ... and cuffs! Can Yuya smooth things out before Sylvio and Celina put a wrinkle in his plan?

episodes.title: Super Duelists
episodes.plot: It's a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

episodes.title: Invitation to the Dark Duel
episodes.plot: A mysterious and shady man named Gallager appeared before Gongenzaka and Dennis.

episodes.title: Dueling's Most Wanted
episodes.plot: Dennis deployed his Pendulum Summon in his Duel against Shun. Detecting that Summon, Roget, the Director of the Security, decided to keep an eye on them. On the other hand, Reira was depressed since Reiji is not with him. Yuya wants to make Reira smile, but a slight difference in their opinions caused some hostility between Crow and Yuya.

episodes.title: No Cards, No Pardon
episodes.plot: Yuya learns the ins and outs of The Facility the hard way by coming face-to-face with the toughest and most dangerous duelist in the cell block: the Kingpin!

episodes.title: The Man Who Threw Away His Draws
episodes.plot: Yuya continues his duel with Chojiro, who is able to maintain a lead despite his drawing being limited. Crow recounts how Chojiro fell from being a beloved celebrity and Yuya resolves to bring that Chojiro back.

episodes.title: Great Entertainment Duel Tournament!!
episodes.plot: As Yugo and Yuzu enter the Friendship Cup, Yuya and the others, along with Chojiro, plan to escape from the prison. Their moment arrives when a tournament is held at the prison and they set their plan into motion.

episodes.title: King of Captors - "Goyo King"
episodes.plot: Yuya and co almost managed to escape before the police caught up with them. They fight back as hard as they can only to be completely overwhelmed. Suddenly, a shocking ally comes to their rescue.

episodes.title: Duel King - "Jack Atlas"
episodes.plot: Forced into participating in the Friendship Cup, Yuya decides to play along in the hopes of winning over the Synchro Dimension. The opening ceremony begins as Yuya ends up facing the king of the city, Jack Atlas.

episodes.title: The Shattered Entertainment
episodes.plot: As the Friendship Cup approaches, Yuya laments how his dueling style is failing to win people over and reconsiders his path. Then, a reaction occurs between his, Yuto's and Yugo's dragons.

episodes.title: Opening Duel!! Crow vs Gongenzaka
episodes.plot: The first match of the Friendship Cup is between Synchro users Crow and Gongenzaka. Superheavy Samurais and Blackwings collide, but Crow is concerned about his kids and cannot concentrate.

episodes.title: The Light and Shadow of the City
episodes.plot: Yuya is worried about Gongenzaka disappearing after his duel but cannot get any answers. Reira is chosen to duel against Shinji but is too terrified to fight. Yuya questions how Reiji can keep sending his brother into dangerous situations.

episodes.title: All-Out Rebellion - Bee Force
episodes.plot: Tsukikage takes Reira's place in the proceedings and faces off against Shinji. Tsukikage uses burn tactics to whittle away at Shinji, but Shinji fights back with his Bee Force deck.

episodes.title: The Sprinting Divas
episodes.plot: The next match of the Friendship Cup pits Yuzu against Chojiro. Yuya does not want to see either of them lose, but they resolve to put on a good show regardless.

episodes.title: An Out-Of-Reach Shout
episodes.plot: Serena wins the final match of the day as everyone rests from a long day. Reiji meets with Jack, who recounts how he rose to become King. Elsewhere, Roget schemes in the shadows.

episodes.title: The Sword of White Silver
episodes.plot: Yuya faces off against Duel Chaser 227, who has been given a second chance by Roget. Yuya desperately tries to tell people about the Cup's dark secret, but they fall on death ears as 227 continues his attack.

episodes.title: Slaying the Dragon!! Yugo vs Sawatari
episodes.plot: The next duel between Yugo and Sawatari begins. Sawatari puts on a brave act about how he'll slay Yugo's powerful monster while Yuya feels a resonation when Clear Wing Synchro Dragon appears.

episodes.title: The Crawling Losers
episodes.plot: In the garbage facility, Sawatari meets up with Gallagher, who tells him about Sergey, a warrior who works for Roget as well as Roget's mysterious past. Reira comes to an epiphany learning this information.

episodes.title: Mask of the Clown
episodes.plot: The first round comes to a close as Shun faces off against Dennis. Dennis continues to play up his showmanship, but Shun is determined to expose him for the fraud that he is using his Raid Raptors.

episodes.title: Curse of the Resistors
episodes.plot: Dennis finally drops the facade and unleashes his powerful Fusion monster against Shun. Dennis gloats about capturing Ruri, but that only stokes the anger inside of Shun to breaking point.

episodes.title: King's Gambit
episodes.plot: Dennis escapes and tries to avoid capture while Roget sets his plan to take over the city into action. To make things worse, Leo sends out his forces, including Yuri, to recover Yuzu and Serena.

episodes.title: The Beauty of Destruction
episodes.plot: Yuzu faces off against Sergey to kick off the first round. Weirdly, Sergey does little to fight back as Yuzu is able to deal heavy damage. But at the most vital point, Sergey's demeanor changes.

episodes.title: Storm of Revolution
episodes.plot: Yuya duels against Shinji next. Yuya cannot concentrate on the match due to worrying about Yuzu while Shinji is empowered by the cries of his fellow Commons to continue his revolution.

episodes.title: The Enlightened Paladin
episodes.plot: With Sora's encouraging words, Yuya gets his head in the game and starts playing seriously. Shinji refuses to back down as Yuya begins a gambit to prove there are no useless cards.

episodes.title: Reunion That Transcends Dimensions
episodes.plot: Yuya meets up with Sora, who confirms that Yuzu is fine and that he is here to capture Serena. Yuya tries to convince Sora to leave Academia, but then Security surrounds the two.

episodes.title: Our Respective Battlefields
episodes.plot: Crow and Shun face off in the next match of the tournament, each being spurred on by their different goals. Meanwhile, Sora continues to avoid Security and Roget tries to coax Yuya to his side.

episodes.title: The Ultimate Falcon VS the Black-Feathered Thunder
episodes.plot: The battle between Crow and Shun continues. After saving one of Crow's kids, the two find some common ground. Giving it all they have, the two bird users fight to the finish.

episodes.title: The Bond Between Teacher and Disciple
episodes.plot: Sora appears to help Yuzu when she is surrounded by Security. Yuzu wants to help Yuya, but Sora stops that since they are caught up in a bigger war. Tsukikage then appears to get revenge on Sora.

episodes.title: Dice Roll of Destiny
episodes.plot: The duel between Yugo and Serena begins. Yugo is initially distracted by Serena's resemblance to Rin, made worse by Roget manipulating the odds so that Serena will win and further his goals.

episodes.title: Crystal Wings
episodes.plot: The duel between Yugo, linked with Yuya, and Serena continues. Serena starts avoiding Roget's tricks so she can fight her own way. Yugo and Yuya meet Serena's challenge and unleash a new power.

episodes.title: Unyielding Resolve
episodes.plot: Yugo pursues Yuri while Roget sends Security to capture Serena. She is saved by the combined efforts of Reiji and Reira, forcing Roget to change his plan of attack.

episodes.title: The Memories of the Beast
episodes.plot: The match between Yuya and Crow begins. Yuya is able to convince Crow to work with him and they begin to enact their plan. However, Roget activates his cerebral restrictor, causing something unexpected to happen.

episodes.title: One Strike of Lightning!
episodes.plot: Yuya has gone into a fit of rage following Roget's plan, beginning a relentless attack against Crow. The Obelisk Force arrive in the city, forcing all parties to reconsider their actions.

episodes.title: Invasion! Obelisk Force
episodes.plot: The Obelisk Force begin their invasion of the Synchro Dimension to capture Serena and Yuzu. The Lancers so their best to oppose the invaders when some unexpected allies arrive to help.

episodes.title: The Beacon of Revolution
episodes.plot: Yuya shows up to help Reira when they are confronted by Barrett. Tsukikage helps everyone in the underground facility fight back against the Obelisk Force, inspiring Shinji to continue his revolution.

episodes.title: Converging Fates
episodes.plot: Yuya is having a tough time against Barrett's trap combo. Sora and Yuzu appear to help, but so do the currently dueling Yugo and Yuri. With all four dragons on the field, they begin to resonate once more.

episodes.title: A Tragic Reunion
episodes.plot: Yuya begins to resonate with his three counterparts when Yuzu manages to save him. However, Sergey then arrives to capture Yuzu and mounts an attack against Barrett and Yuya.

episodes.title: The Destructive Duel Machine
episodes.plot: Yuya and the others form a plan to save Yuzu. To completely take over the city, Roget arranges a duel between Jack and Sergey. Sergey aims to crush the king as Shinji's revolution continues.

episodes.title: The Right Arm That Carved Souls
episodes.plot: Sergey continues his Earthbound Prisoner and Action Card combo to damage Jack. Jack refuses to give up and matches with a fierce counterattack, causing something to change in Sergey.

episodes.title: The Duel You Believe In
episodes.plot: With his plan in shambles, Roget declares martial law and attempts to strong-arm the City under his control. As the rest of the Lancers confront Security, Yuya goes to the Duel Palace to finish things with Jack.

episodes.title: Borrowed Words
episodes.plot: Roget's forces and the Lancers continue to fight as Yuya and Jack commence their final duel. Yuya prepares to activate Smile World, but Jack declares that Yuya should follow his own path and not the one forced upon him.

episodes.title: The Sublime Super Paladin
episodes.plot: Sora and Tsukikage manage to stop the oncoming Duel Chasers as Yuya and Jack continue to fight. Unleashing his power, Yuya summons Nirvana High Paladin and matches Jack's powerful Tyrant Red Dragon Archfiend.

episodes.title: Towards the Only Path
episodes.plot: The duel between Yuya and Jack finally comes to its conclusion. As the High Council prepares to unite the City and assist the Lancers in their fight against Academia, Roget commences his final gambit.

episodes.title: The Eternal Duel
episodes.plot: Declan takes on Roget on one final duel in order to defeat him and free the people of the city from his control.

episodes.title: Swing Into Action: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yuya Sakaki aims to become an "Entertainment Duelist". He practices dueling every day alongside his childhood friend, Yuzu. One day, he receives a challenge for an exhibition match from the Pro Duelist, "Strong Ishijima". Although Yuya excitedly fends off his attacks in their Action Duel, he's eventually pushed into a corner.

episodes.title: Swing Into Action: Part 2
episodes.plot: Yuya tries out his new "Pendulum Summon".

episodes.title: Trade Bait: Part 1
episodes.plot: It could be curtains for Yuya when a rival student cons him out of his Pendulum Cards!

episodes.title: Trade Bait: Part 2
episodes.plot: Still shocked by Sylvio's Pendulum Summon, Yuya must find his focus if he wants to save his friends from a 100-story drop!

episodes.title: Toying Around: Part 1
episodes.plot: The new kid in town drives Yuya bananas when he begs Yuya to be his duel teacher! Unfortunately for Yuya, this blue-haired battler won't give up until Yuya gives in!

episodes.title: Toying Around: Part 2
episodes.plot: Yuya's getting schooled by his wannabe student, Sora! Can Yuya turn things around and teach Sora a lesson about winning, or is Yuya's Pendulum power not going to make the grade?

episodes.title: Mr. Mystery
episodes.plot: Still steaming from his loss to Yuya, Sylvio looks to get some payback! But when Zuzu steps in to stop his plans, a mysterious stranger comes out of the shadows to show her how it's done!

episodes.title: Bad Business
episodes.plot: The Leo Institute is looking to take over Yuya's duel school, and they're bringing 3 of their most dangerous duelists to take down whoever dares stand in their way!

episodes.title: Dueling with the Stars
episodes.plot: The battle to save Yuya's duel school goes galactic when Yuya faces off against Leo Institute's Dipper, an out-of-this-world duelist whose interstellar skills could have Yuya seeing stars!

episodes.title: You Show 'Em
episodes.plot: It's a gem of a duel when Zuzu faces a fierce Fusion Summoner whose jewel monsters are a cut above the rest! Can Zuzu and her Divas belt out a victory, or will the Leo Institute's diamond of a duelist force a final face-off?

episodes.title: Going, Going, Gong
episodes.plot: It's all up to Gong to save You Show from falling into the hands of the Leo Institute! Can Gong stare down defeat without moving his feet, or will a sword-swinging Syncro Summoner slice and dice his way to victory?

episodes.title: Battle Under the Big Top
episodes.plot: It's a battle under the big top, but no one's clowning around! Yuya duels Declan to determine the fate of Yuya's duel school!

episodes.title: Circus Surprise!
episodes.plot: Declan has a surprise in store that could swing the duel his way! Can Yuya take down the best the Leo Institute has to offer, or will Declan's deck prove to be unbeatable?

episodes.title: The Show Must Go On
episodes.plot: Yuya's down in the dumps, but Principal Boyle's not having it! Looking to snap Yuya out of his funk, Skip challenges Yuya to a duel to prove that the show must go on!

episodes.title: In It to Win It
episodes.plot: Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance - Sora! But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!

episodes.title: Menu Venue: Part 1
episodes.plot: To gain eligibility to join the Junior Youth Championship, Yuya has to win 4 official duels consecutively. He ends up dueling is Michio Mokota, a cuisine Duelist with high popularity among the housewives.

episodes.title: Menu Venue: Part 2
episodes.plot: Yuya faces a ferocious attack against Michio Mokota's Cooking Duel.

episodes.title: Trapped in a Card
episodes.plot: It's a case of mistaken identity when Yuya is eyed as the primary suspect for attacking Leo students! But when Yuya crosses paths with the real culprit, things go from bad to worse!

episodes.title: Quiz Quagmire: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre L'SupÃ©rieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

episodes.title: Quiz Quagmire: Part 2
episodes.plot: In the finale of the mind-bending match that's part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz who's never wrong?

episodes.title: Beyond Belief
episodes.plot: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

episodes.title: A Date with Fate: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yuya's future takes a terrifying turn for the worse when he battles a fortunetelling foe who predicts this will be his last duel ever! Can Yuya fix his fate and avoid a devastating disaster, or has his luck finally run out?

episodes.title: A Date with Fate: Part 2
episodes.plot: As Yuya's battle against the fortunetelling predictress Aura flares to its finish, it becomes crystal clear that Yuya's danger-filled future is becoming a reality!

episodes.title: For Our Tomorrows
episodes.plot: Mysteries are revealed when the masked duelist who's been terrorizing Leo Institute students is confronted and challenged to a battle royal!

episodes.title: Battle Between Buddies: Part 1
episodes.plot: Yuya needs one more win to get into the Championship, but it will be his most difficult battle yet when he discovers he has to beat his best bud Gong in order to move on!

episodes.title: Battle Between Buddies: Part 2
episodes.plot: The battle between best buds Yuya and Gong for a spot in the Arc League Championships rages to a friend-zied finish!

episodes.title: Challengers Assemble
episodes.plot: Let the games begin! The top duelists from around the globe have gathered together for the Arc League Championships to find out who's the best duelist in the world!

episodes.title: Something's Fishy
episodes.plot: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allie's deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

episodes.title: Fusion Foes
episodes.plot: Zuzu takes center stage in an epic rematch against Leo Institute's dueling diamond, Julia Krystal! Will Zuzu avenge her earlier loss and walk away a winner, or will history repeat itself and leave Zuzu singing the blues?

episodes.title: Gong the Strong
episodes.plot: When Gong's old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!

episodes.title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1
episodes.plot: Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down - a deck full of Pendulum Cards! Could Yuya's days in the spotlight be done for?

episodes.title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2
episodes.plot: Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points! If Yuya can't get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!

episodes.title: Making the Cut: Part 1
episodes.plot: Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Sora's one man show into a no man show!

episodes.title: Making the Cut: Part 2
episodes.plot: Sora and Shay's heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Sora's sweet-toothed smile?

episodes.title: Sora's Secrets: Part 1
episodes.plot: While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge! But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!

episodes.title: Sora's Secrets: Part 2
episodes.plot: Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion! But just when Yuya thinks he's seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!

episodes.title: A Dark Reflection
episodes.plot: Yuya can't believe his eyes when he finds himself standing face-to-face-to-face with two lookalikes who are out to destroy each other... and everything in sight!

episodes.title: Warped
episodes.plot: Yuya is in a coma, and nothing has been able to stir him from his terrifying state! Is Yuya down for the count, or will his duelmate's ESP and TLC make him A-OK?

episodes.title: Imperial Wrath Awakening
episodes.plot: Yuya's opponent is Isao Kachidoki from the Ryozanpaku School in the second round of the Maiami Championship.

episodes.title: Stealth Warriors
episodes.plot: When a mysterious visitor threatens to throw the Championship into chaos, Declan moves in to uncover who they are and soon finds himself facing off against a merciless mercenary!

episodes.title: Bracing for Battle
episodes.plot: Declan confronts Celina and shares a story from their past that reveals a frightening future!

episodes.title: Battle Fields
episodes.plot: It's time for a nail biting battle royal in the ARC League Championship! With four battle zones to choose from, the action has never been more mesmerizing or the duels more dangerous!

episodes.title: Fire and Ice
episodes.plot: While Yuya is looking to knock the competition out cold in the Volcano Zone, the Iceberg Zone is heating up as Zuzu and Gong team up to defrost their foes!

episodes.title: Danger Zones
episodes.plot: As the battle royal rumbles on, Yuya finds himself caught in the crossfire when he stumbles across a battle between not-so-noble Knights!

episodes.title: Obelisk Assault
episodes.plot: Yuya takes on a terrifying trio from Fusion Dimension who turn their victims into cards!

episodes.title: Dragon's Vengeance
episodes.plot: Outnumbered, outmatched, and out of options, will Yuya tap into a deep-seeded darkness to overcome defeat?

episodes.title: Identity Crisis
episodes.plot: Zuzu races to stay one step ahead of a cold-blooded hunter who's hot on her heels! Can Zuzu ditch this danger, or will he prove too cunning for her to escape?

episodes.title: Battlefronts
episodes.plot: Sparks fly in the Volcano Zone when all our heroes face off against the full fury of Fusion Dimension's elite Obelisk Force! With more than life points on the line, the action has never been hotter!

episodes.title: Fighting for Fun
episodes.plot: Are friends now foes as Yuya and Sora go deck to deck in a fiery face-off?
